data.nrql: SELECT PERCENTAGE(COUNT(*), WHERE (cpu_utilization IS NULL OR cpu_utilization < 85) AND (status_check_failed_instance IS NULL OR status_check_failed_instance < 1.0) AND (status_check_failed_system IS NULL OR status_check_failed_system < 1.0)) AS 'Health Score' FROM amazon_ec2_instance FACET amazon_ec2_instance_name
SELECT uniqueCount(amazon_ec2_instance_name) AS 'Instances' FROM amazon_ec2_instance FACET hypervisor
SELECT uniqueCount(amazon_ec2_instance_name) AS 'Instances' FROM amazon_ec2_instance FACET type
SELECT uniqueCount(amazon_ec2_instance_name) AS 'Instances' FROM amazon_ec2_instance FACET region

presentation.title: Region Distribution
presentation.notes: The AWS Region this object belongs to.

data.nrql: SELECT sum(disk_read_bytes) FROM amazon_ec2_instance COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Disk Read Bytes (Bytes)
presentation.notes: Bytes read from all instance store volumes available to the instance.

data.nrql: SELECT sum(disk_write_bytes) FROM amazon_ec2_instance COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Disk Write Bytes (Bytes)
presentation.notes: Bytes read from all instance store volumes available to the instance.

data.nrql: SELECT sum(status_check_failed_system) FROM amazon_ec2_instance COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Status Check Failed System
presentation.notes: Reports whether the instance has passed the system status check in the last minute.

data.nrql: SELECT sum(status_check_failed_system) FROM amazon_ec2_instance COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Status Check Failed System
presentation.notes: Reports whether the instance has passed the system status check in the last minute.

data.nrql: SELECT average(cpu_utilization) FROM amazon_ec2_instance COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: CPU Utilization (Percent)
presentation.notes: The percentage of allocated EC2 compute units that are currently in use on the instance. This metric identifies the processing power required to run an application upon a selected instance.

data.nrql: SELECT sum(network_in) FROM amazon_ec2_instance COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Network In
presentation.notes: The number of bytes received on all network interfaces by the instance. This metric identifies the volume of incoming network traffic to a single instance.

data.nrql: SELECT sum(network_out) FROM amazon_ec2_instance COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Network Out (Bytes)
presentation.notes: The number of bytes sent out on all network interfaces by the instance. This metric identifies the volume of outgoing network traffic from a single instance.

data.nrql: SELECT average(disk_read_ops) FROM amazon_ec2_instance COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Disk Read Ops
presentation.notes: Completed read operations from all instance store volumes available to the instance in a specified period of time.

data.nrql: SELECT average(disk_write_ops) FROM amazon_ec2_instance COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Disk Write Ops
presentation.notes: Completed write operations to all instance store volumes available to the instance in a specified period of time.
